entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
